Name: Monte
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: POUR first 3 ingredients into empty glass. ADD soda water to half fill glass. Fill glass with ice and then top up with more soda. (This avoids 'shocking' the anis with the ice.) Serve with straws.
Review: A long, fragrant, almost floral summer drink cooler with lots of aniseed.
History: An adaptation of a drink created in 2002 by Alex Turner, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Monte contains 131 calories
